nodes.name: execScript
execScript

params._blacklist: Addresses the script cannot call to, or will revert.
params._script: [ specId (uint32) ] many calls with this structure ->   [ to (address: 20 bytes) ] [ calldataLength (uint32: 4 bytes) ] [ calldata (calldataLength bytes) ]

getInitializationBlock().return: Block number in which the contract was initialized

hasInitialized().return: Whether the contract has been initialized by the time of the current block

execScript(bytes,bytes,address[]).notice: Executes a number of call scripts
